RCS5047 CA REMOTE CONSOLE INTERFACE ABEND ENCOUNTERED, RECOVERY BEING
 ATTEMPTED

     Explanation: CA REMOTE Console encountered an abend in its interface
     routine. CA REMOTE Console tries to generate an SVC dump and continues
     processing.

     Action: Gather the appropriate diagnostic information (dumps, system
     logs, and so on) and contact Computer Associates Technical Support for
     help.
